attributes.action: Stop the noise of firework bangers above certain decibel so animals don't suffer
attributes.additional_details: You would have the power to instigate any fines and of the sale of the fireworks
attributes.background: To stop the sale of these noisy fireworks. For them not to enter the UK from abroad. To fine anyone who does fire one off.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Reduce the sound of fireworks to under 80 decibels for humans and animals
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739674

Reduce the maximum noise level for consumer fireworks from 120 to 90 decibels
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/738192
